english: Would you please have a look at this document?
spanish: ¿Podrías echarle un vistazo a este documento?

english: Yesterday I listened to a very beautiful song.
spanish: Ayer escuché una canción muy bonita.

english: You and Tom used to be friends. What happened?
spanish: Tú solías ser amigo de Tom. ¿Qué pasó?

english: You are always complaining about your husband.
spanish: Siempre te estás quejando de tu marido.

english: You are not in a position to ask for anything.
spanish: No estás en condiciones de pedir nada.

english: You can be pretty helpful when you want to be.
spanish: Puedes ser de gran ayuda cuando quieres.

english: You can do whatever you want to do, of course.
spanish: Puedes hacer lo que quieras, por supuesto.

english: You can get there in less than thirty minutes.
spanish: Puedes llegar ahí en menos de treinta minutos.

english: You can hear the water dripping from the pipe.
spanish: Tú puedes oír el goteo del agua por la tubería.

english: You can see the ancient ruins in the distance.
spanish: Pueden ver a lo lejos las ruinas de la antigüedad.

english: You can set the white of an egg by boiling it.
spanish: Puedes hacer la clara del huevo cociéndola.

english: You can skate safely on this side of the lake.
spanish: Se puede patinar sin peligro en este lado del lago.

english: You can sleep here for a while if you want to.
spanish: Puedes dormir aquí un rato si quieres.

english: You can't enter the building without a permit.
spanish: No puedes entrar al edificio sin autorización.

english: You cannot be too careful in choosing friends.
spanish: No puedes ser demasiado cauteloso al elegir a los amigos.

english: You could see the look of scorn on Tom's face.
spanish: Podías ver una mirada de desprecio en la cara de Tom.

english: You don't have to answer if you don't want to.
spanish: No tienes que contestar si no quieres.

english: You don't have to eat it if you don't want to.
spanish: No tenés que comerlo si no querés.

english: You don't have to tell the truth all the time.
spanish: No tienes para que decir la verdad todo el tiempo.

english: You don't usually do that by yourself, do you?
spanish: Normalmente no lo haces tú mismo, ¿verdad?

english: You had better learn either English or French.
spanish: Sería mejor que aprendieras inglés o francés.

english: You had better learn either English or French.
spanish: Mejor hubieras aprendido inglés o francés.

english: You have to cross the ocean to get to America.
spanish: Debes cruzar el océano para llegar a América.

english: You have to do it, whether you like it or not.
spanish: Tienes que hacerlo, quieras o no.

english: You know where to find me if you want to talk.
spanish: Sabés donde encontrarme si querés hablar.

english: You make mistakes if you do things in a hurry.
spanish: Cometes errores si haces las cosas de prisa.

english: You may give this picture to whoever wants it.
spanish: Le puedes dar esta fotografía a quien sea que la quiera.

english: You might want to try studying in the library.
spanish: Quizá quieras intentar estudiar en la biblioteca.

english: You must get the job done before the deadline.
spanish: Tienes que acabar este trabajo antes de la fecha señalada.

english: You need to have friends who can help you out.
spanish: Necesitas tener amigos que puedan echarte una mano.

english: You need to stop doing things that bother Tom.
spanish: Necesitas dejar de hacer las cosas que molestan a Tom.

english: You ought to have invited him, but you didn't.
spanish: Deberías haberle invitado, pero no lo hiciste.

english: You should choose your friends very carefully.
spanish: Deberías elegir a tus amigos con mucho cuidado.

english: You should come back home before it gets dark.
spanish: Deberías volver antes de que anochezca.

english: You should look out for potholes when driving.
spanish: Deberías tener cuidado con los baches cuando conduces.

english: You should pay more attention to what you say.
spanish: Deberías prestar más atención a lo que decís.

english: You should pay more attention to what you say.
spanish: Deberían prestar más atención a lo que dicen.

english: You should read many books when you are young.
spanish: Hay que leer muchos libros cuando se es joven.

english: You should stay in bed for three or four days.
spanish: Deberías quedarte en la cama tres o cuatro días.

english: You should take advantage of this opportunity.
spanish: Deberías sacar ventaja de esa oportunidad.

english: You should write it down before you forget it.
spanish: Deberías escribirlo antes de que se te olvide.

english: You shouldn't talk when the teacher's talking.
spanish: No deberías hablar cuando el profesor está hablando.

english: You want me to wash my hands first, don't you?
spanish: Quieres que me lave las manos primero, ¿verdad?

english: You will soon adapt yourself to this new life.
spanish: Pronto te adaptarás a esta nueva vida.

english: You'll get a lot of presents on your birthday.
spanish: Vas a recibir un montón de regalos de cumpleaños.

english: You're just not the person I thought you were.
spanish: Simplemente no eres la persona que yo creía.

english: You're just running away from life's problems.
spanish: Tú simplemente huyes de los problemas de la vida.

english: You're the first woman I've ever really loved.
spanish: Eres la primera mujer a la que he amado de verdad.

english: You're the most beautiful girl I've ever seen.
spanish: Tú eres la chica más linda que jamás haya visto.

english: You're the only person I know that owns a gun.
spanish: Eres la única persona que conozco que posee un arma.

english: You're the only person I know who can help me.
spanish: Eres la única persona que conozco que puede ayudarme.

english: Your father would have been very proud of you.
spanish: Tu padre habría estado muy orgulloso de ti.

english: "A rolling stone gathers no moss" is a proverb.
spanish: "Una piedra rodante no junta musgo" es un refrán.

english: "Are these your books?" "No, they're not mine."
spanish: "¿Estos son sus libros?" "No, no son míos".

english: "Do you have anything to do?" "No, not really."
spanish: "¿Tienes algo que hacer?" "La verdad es que no."

english: "Do you want to leave a message?" "No, thanks."
spanish: «¿Quiere dejar un mensaje?» «No, gracias.»

english: "How many boys do you have?" "I only have one."
spanish: "¿Cuántos niños varones tienes?" "Solo tengo uno."

english: "Thank you for helping me." "Don't mention it."
spanish: "Gracias por ayudarme." "No hay de qué."

english: "Where's Tom?" "He's playing tennis with Mary."
spanish: "¿Dónde está Tom?" "Está jugando al tenis con Mary."

english: "Whose earrings are these?" "They are Tania's."
spanish: "¿De quién son esos pendientes?" "Son de Tania."

english: A bad cold caused the singer to lose his voice.
spanish: Un serio resfriado le hizo al cantante perder su voz.

english: A fire broke out in the supermarket last night.
spanish: Anoche hubo un incendio en el supermercado.

english: A fire broke out in the supermarket last night.
spanish: Anoche se produjo un incendio en el supermercado.

english: A friend of mine came to see me during the day.
spanish: Un amigo mío vino a verme durante el día.

english: A good teacher must be patient with his pupils.
spanish: Un buen profesor debe ser paciente con sus pupilos.

english: A lot of people are dealing with allergies now.
spanish: Mucha gente se las está viendo con alergias ahora.

english: A lot of people are dealing with hay fever now.
spanish: Ahora mucha gente está sufriendo alergias al polen.

english: A man came in and sat on the stool next to her.
spanish: Un hombre entró y se sentó en el taburete al lado de ella.

english: A new treatment for hepatitis is being studied.
spanish: Se está estudiando un nuevo tratamiento para la hepatitis.

english: A strange sound was heard from behind the door.
spanish: Un sonido extraño se escuchó detrás de la puerta.

english: A stranger came up to me and asked me the time.
spanish: Un desconocido se me acercó y me preguntó la hora.

english: A tsunami is coming, so please be on the alert.
spanish: Un tsunami se aproxima, estad alerta por favor.

english: A woman like you doesn't deserve a man like me.
spanish: Una mujer como vos no merece un hombre como yo.

english: About one third of the earth's surface is land.
spanish: Aproximadamente un tercio de la superficie de la Tierra es suelo firme.

english: About this time tomorrow, we will be in London.
spanish: Mañana por esta hora estaremos en Londres.

english: According to what I heard, they have broken up.
spanish: Según lo que oí, ellos terminaron.

english: After Tom dumped Mary, she started seeing John.
spanish: Después de que Tom plantara a Mary, ésta comenzó a verse con John.

english: After all we had done, he was still ungrateful.
spanish: Él fue ingrato aún después de todo lo que habíamos hecho.

english: After decades of civil war, order was restored.
spanish: Después de décadas de guerra civil, el orden fue restablecido.

english: After he had done his homework, he went to bed.
spanish: Él se fue a la cama después de haber terminado su tarea.

english: After the revolution, France became a republic.
spanish: Después de la revolución, Francia se hizo república.

english: All Tom wanted was for Mary to leave him alone.
spanish: Todo lo que Tom quería era que Mary lo dejara solo.

english: All our teachers were young and loved teaching.
spanish: Todos nuestros profesores eran jóvenes y amaban enseñar.

english: All the apples that fall are eaten by the pigs.
spanish: Los cerdos se comen todas las manzanas caídas.

english: All we can do is wait for the police to arrive.
spanish: Lo único que podemos hacer es esperar a que llegue la policía.

english: All you have to do is apologize for being late.
spanish: Todo lo que tienes que hacer es pedir perdón por llegar tarde.

english: All you have to do is to take care of yourself.
spanish: Todo lo que tienes que hacer es cuidar de ti mismo.

english: All you have to do is to wait for me to return.
spanish: Todo lo que tú tienes que hacer es esperar a que yo regrese.

english: Almost all of Tom's ex-wives still talk to him.
spanish: Casi todas las ex-mujeres de Tom todavía se hablan con él.

english: Almost every tourist carries a camera with him.
spanish: Casi todo turista lleva una cámara consigo.

english: Although her house is nearby, I seldom see her.
spanish: Aunque su casa queda cerca, yo rara vez la veo.

english: Although she is rich, she dresses quite simply.
spanish: Aunque ella es rica, viste con bastante sencillez.

english: An Englishman would not pronounce it like that.
spanish: Un inglés no pronuncia eso de esa forma.

english: An angle of 90 degrees is called a right angle.
spanish: A un ángulo de 90 grados se le llama un ángulo recto.

english: Animals can't tell what's real and what's fake.
spanish: Los animales no pueden distinguir lo verdadero de lo falso.

english: Are these the pictures that you took in Boston?
spanish: ¿Estas son las fotos que sacaste en Boston?

english: Are you seriously thinking about having a baby?
spanish: ¿Estás pensando seriamente en tener un bebé?

english: Are you still planning on going back to Boston?
spanish: ¿Todavía estás planeando volver a Boston?

english: Are you sure you don't want to stay for dinner?
spanish: ¿Estás segura que no querés quedarte a comer?

english: As soon as I can afford to buy a house, I will.
spanish: Tan pronto como pueda costearme comprar una casa, lo haré.

english: At last, spring has come to this part of Japan.
spanish: Por fin la primavera ha llegado a esta parte de Japón.

english: At night, we see more stars here than in Tokyo.
spanish: De noche podemos ver más estrellas aquí que en Tokio.

english: At the end of the speech she repeated the word.
spanish: Al final del discurso, ella repitió la palabra.

english: At what age did you have your first girlfriend?
spanish: ¿A qué edad tuviste tu primera novia?

english: Being tired, he went to bed earlier than usual.
spanish: Cansado, se fue a la cama antes de lo normal.

english: Believe it or not, I'm not sarcastic this time.
spanish: Créeme o no, pero esta vez no estoy siendo sarcástico.

english: Berries are high in minerals such as potassium.
spanish: Las bayas son ricas en minerales tales como el potasio.

english: Books are to the mind what food is to the body.
spanish: Los libros son para la mente lo que la comida es para el cuerpo.

english: Buy land. I hear they aren't making it anymore.
spanish: Compra tierra, he oído que ya no se fabrica.

english: By the way, have you heard from her since then?
spanish: Por cierto, ¿ha oído de ella desde entonces?

english: Call the police and tell them what you told me.
spanish: Llamá a la policía y contales lo que me dijiste.

english: Call the police and tell them what you told me.
spanish: Llama a la policía y cuéntales lo que me dijiste.

english: Cars made in Japan are used all over the world.
spanish: En todo el mundo se usan autos fabricados en Japón.

english: Clark Kent is the hero of the Superman stories.
spanish: Clark Kent es el héroe de las historias de Supermán.

english: Cloning people raises serious ethical problems.
spanish: Clonar personas implica un grave dilema ético.

english: Cloning people raises serious ethical problems.
spanish: Clonar personas implica graves dilemas éticos.

english: Cloning people raises serious ethical problems.
spanish: Clonar personas implica un enorme dilema ético.

english: Come here this afternoon between two and three.
spanish: Venga aquí hoy en la tarde entre las dos y las tres.

english: Competition is neither good nor evil in itself.
spanish: La competición en sí misma no es ni buena ni mala.

english: Contact my assistant if you have any questions.
spanish: Contacte a mi asistente si tiene cualquier pregunta.

english: Corn is an important crop in the United States.
spanish: El maíz es una cosecha importante en Estados Unidos.

english: Corn is an important crop in the United States.
spanish: El choclo es una cosecha importante en Estados Unidos.

english: Could you wake me up at the same time tomorrow?
spanish: ¿Me podrías despertar mañana a la misma hora?

english: Delegates debated the compromise for many days.
spanish: Los delegados debatieron el compromiso durante muchos días.

english: Did that really cost you three hundred dollars?
spanish: ¿De verdad te ha costado 300 dólares?

english: Did the union participate in the demonstration?
spanish: ¿El sindicato participó en la manifestación?

english: Did you go anywhere during the summer vacation?
spanish: ¿Ha ido usted a algún sitio durante las vacaciones de verano?

english: Did you have to get up very early this morning?
spanish: ¿Tuviste que levantarte muy temprano esta mañana?

english: Did you hear about the big earthquake in Japan?
spanish: ¿Oíste acerca del gran terremoto en Japón?

english: Do all the exercises at the end of the chapter.
spanish: Haz todos los ejercicios que están al final del capítulo.

english: Do we have enough silverware for thirty people?
spanish: ¿Tenemos suficientes cubiertos para treinta personas?

english: Do we need to watch out for tigers around here?
spanish: ¿Debemos cuidarnos de los tigres por este alrededor?

english: Do you get along well with your new classmates?
spanish: ¿Te llevas bien con tus nuevos compañeros de clase?

english: Do you have any idea what Tom is talking about?
spanish: ¿Tienes idea de qué está hablando Tom?

english: Do you really expect Tom to tell you the truth?
spanish: ¿De verdad esperas que Tom te cuente la verdad?

english: Do you think that you would enjoy being famous?
spanish: ¿Crees que disfrutarías siendo famoso?

english: Do you think the weather will be fine tomorrow?
spanish: ¿Crees que mañana hará buen tiempo?

english: Do you want me to stay or do you want me to go?
spanish: ¿Quieres que me quede o que me vaya?

english: Do you want me to tell Tom that we won't do it?
spanish: ¿Quieres que le diga a Tom que no lo vamos a hacer?

english: Does Tom earn enough money to live in the city?
spanish: ¿Gana Tom suficiente dinero para vivir en la ciudad?

english: Does this letter have to be written in English?
spanish: ¿Esta carta debe ser escrita en inglés?

english: Doing that sort of thing makes you look stupid.
spanish: Hacer ese tipo de cosas te hace ver estúpido.

english: Don't act like you don't know what's happening.
spanish: No actúes como si no supieras lo que está pasando.

english: Don't come complaining to me when it bites you.
spanish: No me vengas con quejas cuando te muerda.

english: Don't expose your skin to the sun for too long.
spanish: No expongas tu piel al sol por tanto tiempo.

english: Don't forget that it's Tom's birthday tomorrow.
spanish: No te olvides de que mañana es el cumpleaños de Tom.

english: Don't forget to return the book to the library.
spanish: No te olvides de devolver el libro a la biblioteca.

english: Don't hesitate to tell me if you need anything.
spanish: No vaciles en decirme si necesitas cualquier cosa.

english: Don't interrupt me! Can't you see I am talking?
spanish: ¡No me interrumpas! ¿No ves que estoy hablando?

english: Don't kill the goose that lays the golden eggs.
spanish: No mates a la gallina de los huevos de oro.

english: Don't kill the goose that lays the golden eggs.
spanish: No mates al ganso de los huevos de oro.

english: Don't put the glass near the edge of the table.
spanish: No pongas el vaso cerca del borde de la mesa.

english: Don't stick your nose into my personal affairs.
spanish: No te metas en mis asuntos personales.

english: Don't worry about Tom. He always acts that way.
spanish: No te preocupes por Tom. Siempre actúa así.

english: Don't worry about things that aren't important.
spanish: No te preocupes de cosas que no son importantes.

english: Don't worry about things that aren't important.
spanish: No se preocupe de cosas sin importancia.

english: Don't worry. I told you everything would be OK.
spanish: No te preocupes. Te dije que todo estaría bien.

english: Don't you ever wear any color other than black?
spanish: ¿No te pones nunca otro color que no sea el negro?

english: Don't you ever wear any color other than black?
spanish: ¿No te vistes nunca de otro color que no sea de negro?

english: Driving through that snowstorm was a nightmare.
spanish: Conducir en medio de una tormenta fue una pesadilla.

english: During the day, we work, and at night, we rest.
spanish: Por el día trabajamos y por la noche descansamos.

english: Each one of us was given three hundred dollars.
spanish: Cada uno de nosotros recibió trescientos dólares.

english: Each one of us was given three hundred dollars.
spanish: A cada uno de nosotros se nos dio trescientos dólares.

english: Each one of us was given three hundred dollars.
spanish: A cada uno de nosotros nos dieron trescientos dólares.

english: Each person was given enough food and clothing.
spanish: A cada persona se le otorgó suficiente comida y ropa.

english: Elephants are the world's largest land animals.
spanish: Los elefantes son los animales terrestres más grandes del mundo.

english: Even though she was a child, she wasn't afraid.
spanish: Era una niña, pero no estaba asustada.

english: Every boy and girl is taught to read and write.
spanish: A todo chico y chica se le enseña a leer y escribir.

english: Every house on our street was blue except ours.
spanish: Todas las casas de nuestra calle excepto la nuestra eran azules.

english: Every room in my house has two or more windows.
spanish: Cada habitación de mi casa tiene dos o más ventanas.

english: Everybody in the room let out a sigh of relief.
spanish: Todos en la habitación dieron un suspiro de alivio.

english: Everyone is eligible regardless of nationality.
spanish: Todo el mundo es elegible independientemente de la nacionalidad.

english: Everyone says I'm bad, and maybe they're right.
spanish: Todos dicen que soy malo, y tal vez tengan razón.

english: Everyone seems to be short of money these days.
spanish: En estos tiempos todo el mundo parece andar falto de dinero.

english: Everyone thinks Tom married Mary for her money.
spanish: Todos piensan que Tom se casó con Mary por el dinero.

english: Father told me that World War II ended in 1945.
spanish: Mi papá me dijo que la segunda guerra mundial terminó en 1945.

english: For Tom, getting fired was an unexpected shock.
spanish: Para Tom, ser despedido fue un shock inesperado.

english: For all I know, he could be in Paris right now.
spanish: Por lo que sé, él podría estar en París ahora.

english: For all I know, he could be in Paris right now.
spanish: De acuerdo a lo que sé, él podría estar en París en este momento.
